blogPost.excerpt: Instantly find the "best fit" VC funds for your startup. OpenVC lets you browse 2,200+ funds by investment criteria. In return, VCs receive less spam and more qualified deal flow. Let's build an open way into VC!
blogPost.body: Instantly find the "best fit" VC funds for your startup. OpenVC lets you browse 2,200+ funds by investment criteria. In return, VCs receive less spam and more qualified deal flow. Let's build an open way into VC!
blogPost.title: OpenVC - 2200+ VC firms by thesis to find 'best fit' for your startup
blogPost.author: Steph Nass

localize.description: 即时找到 "最适合 "你的创业公司的风险投资基金。OpenVC可以让您按投资标准浏览2200多个基金。作为回报，VC收到的垃圾信息更少，合格的交易流更多。让我们建立一个开放的方式进入VC!
localize.tagline: 2200+家风投公司按论文分类，为你的创业公司找到 "最适合"。

localize.description: 即時找到 "最適合 "你的創業公司的風險投資基金。OpenVC可以讓您按投資標準瀏覽2200多個基金。作爲回報，VC收到的垃圾信息更少，合格的交易流更多。讓我們建立一個開放的方式進入VC!
localize.tagline: 2200+家風投公司按論文分類，爲你的創業公司找到 "最適合"。

previous.excerpt: Here’s to the Crazyones. Crazyones New Tab is a free Google Chrome extension that brings daily inspiration to your new tab. With inspirational quotes and always-on goal reminder, get things done and boost your productivity!
previous.title: Crazyones New Tab - Open a new tab and get inspired by legendary entrepreneurs

localize.description: 为Crazyones干杯。Crazyones New Tab 是一款免费的 Google Chrome 扩展程序，它可以为您的新标签页带来每日灵感。通过励志名言和始终如一的目标提醒，您可以把事情做完，并提高您的工作效率！Crazyones New Tab 是一款免费的 Google Chrome 扩展程序，可为您的新标签页带来每日灵感。
localize.tagline: 打开一个新的标签页，得到传奇企业家的启发

localize.description: 爲Crazyones乾杯。Crazyones New Tab 是一款免費的 Google Chrome 擴展程序，它可以爲您的新標籤頁帶來每日靈感。通過勵志名言和始終如一的目標提醒，您可以把事情做完，並提高您的工作效率！Crazyones New Tab 是一款免費的 Google Chrome 擴展程序，可爲您的新標籤頁帶來每日靈感。
localize.tagline: 打開一個新的標籤頁，得到傳奇企業家的啓發

next.excerpt: Alt lets you treat your sports card collection as an investment portfolio. You can buy and sell pre-authenticated cards on our exchange and track the current market value for all your assets with our integrated portfolio management view.
next.title: Alt - Invest in sports cards just like stocks

localize.description: Alt让您把您的运动卡收藏当作一个投资组合。您可以在我们的交易所购买和出售预认证卡，并通过我们的综合投资组合管理视图跟踪您所有资产的当前市场价值。
localize.tagline: 投资体育卡就像投资股票一样

localize.description: Alt讓您把您的運動卡收藏當作一個投資組合。您可以在我們的交易所購買和出售預認證卡，並通過我們的綜合投資組合管理視圖跟蹤您所有資產的當前市場價值。
localize.tagline: 投資體育卡就像投資股票一樣
